name: FIFA: Road to World Cup 98
overview: THE WORLD IS WATCHING! Join the world's best athletes in the quest for the cup in FIFA Rood To World Cup 98! Experience all the pulse-pounding action as you battle league teams from across the globe for the most prestigious award in the world's most popular sport. You'll need all the moves you can muster from headers to scissor kicks to give-and-go passing just to have a shot at the finals. Lace up your cleats...it's time to go for the goal!
